items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

items.content_html: An open-source, lightweight Minecraft server manager.
items.title: usespawnd/spawnd: An open-source, lightweight Minecraft server manager.

items.content_html: Real-time Text Sharing App is a lightweight, private, real-time text sharing platform built using Node.js, TypeScript, and the ws WebSocket library. It allows users to create or join private rooms where they can instantly share messages with others in real time.
items.title: Steath094/EzShare: Real-time Text Sharing App is a lightweight, private, real-time text sharing platform built using Node.js, TypeScript, and the ws WebSocket library. It allows users to create or join private rooms where they can instantly share messages with others in real time.

items.content_html: A lightweight, self-hosted mood and journal tracker.
items.title: Caliapus/Startrail: A lightweight, self-hosted mood and journal tracker.

items.content_html: restViz is a lightweight library designed to create a dynamic web interface for Express applications. It automatically lists all defined API routes, providing an interactive interface explore and document your API.
items.title: theCalculatar/restViz: restViz is a lightweight library designed to create a dynamic web interface for Express applications. It automatically lists all defined API routes, providing an interactive interface explore and document your API.

items.content_html: A lightweight utility to create beautiful, stylized SVG maps.
items.title: thejessewinton/svg-dotted-map: A lightweight utility to create beautiful, stylized SVG maps.

items.content_html: A lightweight React Native TypeScript library for privacy-friendly user interaction tracking, including screen views, taps, gestures, and custom events. Supports local export and remote analytics.
items.title: NyomanAdiwinanda/rn-interaction-tracker: A lightweight React Native TypeScript library for privacy-friendly user interaction tracking, including screen views, taps, gestures, and custom events. Supports local export and remote analytics.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight Node.js API using Puppeteer to extract spent and estimated time from GitLab issue pages. It's designed to be consumed by a Chrome Extension, allowing users to visualize time tracking directly on GitLab boards.
items.title: exagonsoft/gitlab-time-tracker-server: This is a lightweight Node.js API using Puppeteer to extract spent and estimated time from GitLab issue pages. It's designed to be consumed by a Chrome Extension, allowing users to visualize time tracking directly on GitLab boards.

items.content_html: A lightweight, fully client-side SEPA XML (ISO 20022 `pain.001.001.03`) viewer and parser written in JavaScript. This tool helps users parse and visualize batch SEPA Credit Transfer XML files directly in the browser — no upload to backend!
items.title: roverbird/sepa-pain-js: A lightweight, fully client-side SEPA XML (ISO 20022 `pain.001.001.03`) viewer and parser written in JavaScript. This tool helps users parse and visualize batch SEPA Credit Transfer XML files directly in the browser — no upload to backend!

items.content_html: A lightweight collaborative drawing platform built with Excalidraw, Next.js, YJS and Socket.IO, enabling real-time whiteboard collaboration with persistent storage capabilities.
items.title: mizuka-wu/excalidraw-yjs-starter: A lightweight collaborative drawing platform built with Excalidraw, Next.js, YJS and Socket.IO, enabling real-time whiteboard collaboration with persistent storage capabilities.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
items.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟

items.content_html: Tona DB Mini is a straightforward library designed for storing and retrieving JSON data efficiently. 🌟 Explore its features and contribute to the project on GitHub! 🚀
items.title: abissofficial/tona-db-mini: Tona DB Mini is a straightforward library designed for storing and retrieving JSON data efficiently. 🌟 Explore its features and contribute to the project on GitHub! 🚀

items.content_html: A customizable, lightweight Twitch chat browser source overlay with AI-powered styling.
items.title: detekoi/compact-chat-overlay: A customizable, lightweight Twitch chat browser source overlay with AI-powered styling.

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
items.title: luanreis28aa/hycom-api: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
items.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
items.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

items.content_html: A lightweight package to upload files—both local and remote—to Notion via the Notion API. Supports internal (local) and external (URL-based) file uploads.
items.title: michael-masarik/notion-upload-js: A lightweight package to upload files—both local and remote—to Notion via the Notion API. Supports internal (local) and external (URL-based) file uploads.
